word: If parents will teach their children to conduct themselves according to the principles of the Word of God, these children will unconsciously teach others what it means to be Christians. Let parents maintain true Christian dignity before their children, and they will be greatly aided in their work of upbuilding the kingdom of Christ.--Letter 90, 1911, pp. 2-5. (To S. N. Haskell and wife, October 25, 1911.)
